words.definition: If a plant or animal is aquatic, it lives or grows in water.
words.example: The dolphin is an aquatic mammal.

words.definition: The biosphere is the earth’s surface and atmosphere where there are living things.
words.example: Birds, trees, and worms all thrive in the biosphere.

words.definition: When something is bizarre, it is very strange.
words.example: My bizarre dreams make no sense to me when I am awake.

words.definition: Celsius is a scale for measuring temperature.
words.example: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius.

words.definition: If something is coarse, that means it has a rough texture.
words.example: The coarse sweater made my skin itch.

words.definition: A companion is a person that someone spends a lot of time with.
words.example: I always walk to school with my companion Frank.

words.definition: To digest means to swallow food and pass it through the body.
words.example: Allow some time for food to be digested before going swimming.

words.definition: The duration of an event is the time during which it happens.
words.example: The girls watched television for the duration of the evening.

words.definition: Ecology is the study of the environment and living things.
words.example: We study ecology to learn how to help improve the Earth.

words.definition: A feat is an impressive or difficult achievement or action.
words.example: The elephant’s standing up on one leg was a feat.

words.definition: If something is infinite, it has no limit or end.
words.example: Many people think that space is infinite.

words.definition: The nucleus is the central part of something.
words.example: The nucleus of an atom is made up of protons and neutrons.

words.definition: A parasite is a tiny animal or plant that lives on or inside another animal or plant.
words.example: The sick dog has a parasite.

words.definition: When something is prominent, it is important and well known.
words.example: The prominent man was invited to give a speech at the graduation.

words.definition: When something is repetitive, it is repeated many times and becomes boring.
words.example: Working in a factory can be a very repetitive job.

words.definition: If something is reproductive, it has to do with a living thing producing another thing like itself.
words.example: The reproductive system of a plant is very different from that of an animal.

words.definition: When a place is temperate, it never gets too hot or too cold.
words.example: In a temperate climate, you can find a lot of different kinds of trees.

words.definition: Tolerance is the ability to accept something untasty or difficult.
words.example: The boy has a high tolerance for spicy food.

words.definition: To undergo means to experience a process or change.
words.example: The building must undergo some repairs before it is safe to use.

words.definition: When someone is vulnerable, they are weak and without protection.
words.example: Small children are very vulnerable and need the care of their parents.
